treesort 3 algorithm 245 m1 the certif of an algorithmcan take the form of a proof that the algorithmis correct as an illustr but practic exampl algorithm 245treesort 3 for sort an arrai is prove correct cacmjune 1970 london r l proof of algorithm debug certifmetatheori sort in place sort 4 42 4 49 524 5 31 ca700613 jb februari 13 1978 10 32am 2042 4 2042 2042 4 2042 2222 4 20422356 4 2042 2679 4 2042 2679 4 2042 28444 2042 2972 4 2042 970 5 2042 1228 52042 2042 5 2042 2042 5 2042 2042 5 20422222 5 2042 2679 5 2042 970 6 2042 9706 2042 1175 6 2042 1190 6 2042 1228 62042 1800 6 2042 1818 6 2042 1834 6 20421969 6 2042 1997 6 2042 308 6 2042 20426 2042 2042 6 2042 3187 6 2042 507 62042 716 6 2042 783 6 2042
